ygData.subject: RE: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, this sounds funny... and what a good way to find out about my fellow bard players :-) When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite: Day of the
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, this sounds funny... and what a good way to find out
about my fellow bard players :-)


When playing your bard in Norrath what is
your favorite:

Day of the week to play: Sunday

Time of day: 5:30am MST - 300 people on the
server :-) shhhhhh

Longest stretch of continuous play: 14 hours

Way to have game sounds: rather loud

Distance to sit from display: 1 foot - with
occasional squinting

TV show to have on: No TV - a SG squashed me
once while watching That 70s Show cuz I was laughing too hard.

Music to listen to: Clash, DK or the
Specials

Beverage (non-alcoholic): Pepsi

Beverage (alcoholic): Pepsi

Health Food: cantaloupe

Junk Food: Pizza

Clothes to wear: I plead the 5th :-)


Tani 15th
Solusek Ro
